title: Kyuuketsuki ni Natta Kimi wa Eien no Ai wo Hajimeru - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Romance   School Life   Shounen   Sports   Supernatural
tags: Acting   Clubs   Hiding True Abilities   Vampires
author: Mizuki Nomura   野村美月
description:
In May of his first year in High School Harada Utaya became something that’s not a human being. He gained inhuman athletic abilities and was unable to continue playing his beloved basketball.

He changed schools and there he met a beautiful – Virgin Mary-like senior (Harushina Ayane) who asked him to be her “lover” Dracula in a play?!>
